{ "tiddlers": { "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/change.log": { "created": "20200510091859948", "creator": "akhater", "text": "''v0.0.31'' - 2020-06-05 * Timezone bugfix for Date display ''v0.0.30'' - 2020-06-04 * Splitting code to multiple tiddlers * Adding parsedate widget * Standardizing entry times by timestamp * You can now change the format by editing $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/dateformat * Enhanced tasks handling * all pending tasks now show in a dedicated tab * Fixed bug of icon being shown always selected ''v0.0.20'' - 2020-05-16 * Added support for simple Todo items by writing /todo command to the input box ''v0.0.18'' - 2020-05-13 * Added toolbar button for easy access (enable it from the control panel) * Minor but fixes ''v0.0.15'' - 2020-05-11 * Visual Tweaks * inline Edit of entries ''v0.0.11'' - 2020-05-11 * Recoded from scratch * Cleaner code * Delete Icon just shows on hover * Different Icons for expanded and non expanded entries * Cleaner Daily Note tiddler easier to manually edit ''v0.0.6'' - 2020-05-10 * Added a way to see older Daily Notes ''v0.0.4'' - 2020-05-10 * Initial Release", "bag": "default", "revision": "1", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/change.log", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605132655355" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture": { "created": "20200509164956768", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\import $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions \import $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/variables \import $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions/todo <$vars dateformat={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/dateformat}} today=<> todayUTC=<> lf=" " > {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/captureEntries}} {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/tabs}} ", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605221321461", "icon": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon", "caption": "Daily Notes" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/readme": { "created": "20200510092225619", "text": "[[Daily Notes|https://github.com/akhater/Daily-Notes-for-TW5]] brings interstitial journaling to TiddlyWiki ''Usage'' * Keyboard shortcut Alt+Q by default * Create a tiddler and put the below in it to show the interface without shortcut (e.g. for mobile use) ** `` {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture}} `` * To add a todo item simply add ``/todo`` to your entry ", "tags": "", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/readme", "modified": "20200516174200664", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "revision": "48", "bag": "default" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut": { "created": "20200509171745928", "creator": "akhater", "text": "<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-Source"/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture"/> ", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut", "modified": "20200527075150745", "key": "((DailyNotes))", "modifier": "akhater" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet": { "created": "20200509183459884", "text": "input.dn-input.input-large { width: 100%; padding: .5em 1em; font-size: 1.1em; } .dn-label { display: block; text-align: right; font-size: .8em; opacity: .6; } input.dn-input:focus { border-color: rgb(255, 201, 102); } .DN-entries .DN-deleteButton { opacity: 0; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-deleteButton { opacity: 1; fill: grey; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-deleteButton:hover { fill: #c70000 ; } .DN-entries .DN-editButton { opacity: 0; } .DN-entries:hover .DN-editButton { opacity: 1; } .DN-editButton:hover { fill: #228c22 ; } .DN-check-edit input{display:none;} .DN-check-edit svg{fill:grey;height:1em;width:1em;curser:pointer;} .DN-check-edit:hover svg{ fill:green; }", "bag": "default", "revision": "32", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20200511165058276" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/buttons/open-DailyNotes": { "created": "20200512053105188", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\whitespace trim \define DailyNotes-button() <$button tooltip="Open Daily Notes" aria-label="Open Daily Notes" class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$"""> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-Source"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Open Daily Notes"/> \end <>", "bag": "default", "revision": "7", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/buttons/open-DailyNotes", "tags": "$:/tags/PageControls", "modified": "20200527075130926", "description": "Opens Daily Notes", "caption": "{{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon}} Daily Notes", "modifier": "akhater" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon": { "text": "", "bag": "default", "revision": "5", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/images/journal-icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20200513070135038", "created": "20200511213348318" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/dateformat": { "text": "YYYY-0MM-0DD", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/dateformat", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200527144818076", "creator": "akhater", "created": "20200526204041018" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions": { "created": "20200521201916934", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\define listNotTodo()
<>
\end \define show-deleteButton() <$button class=<> tooltip="Delete Entry" set={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} setTo={{{ [splitjoin[]] }}} > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end \define start-entryEdit() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$" text="$(entryTime)$~$(entryAction)$$(entryData)$" /> \end \define end-entryEdit() <$set name=edittedEntry tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$"> <$set name="trimmedEdittedEntry" value={{{ [trim[]] }}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} $field="text" $value={{{ [splitjoin] }}} /> \end \define show-editButton() <$vars state=<> > <$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" checked="edit" unchecked="" uncheckactions=<> checkactions=<> class="DN-check-edit">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="edit">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/DN-editEntry/$(entryData)$" field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor" tag=input />
\end \define DN_ifTiddlerNotExists() <$button class=<> tooltip="Expand Entry" > {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> text="""[[$(today)$]] @ $(entryTime)$""" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> /> <> <> <> <>
\end \define DN_ifTiddlerExists() <$list filter="[title] +[has[title]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$button class=<> tooltip="Zoom to Entry" > {{$:/core/images/link}} <$action-navigate $to=<> /> <> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/DN-Source" text=<> > <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/temp/DN-Source" text=<> > <> <> <>
\end \define show-entryData() <$list filter="[!is[blank]]" > <> <> \end \define get-updatedText() $(currentContent)$$(lf)$''<>''~$(add)$
\define entry-notTodo() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$fieldmangler tiddler=<> > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="DailyNotes" /> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/Append" newEntry /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" text=<> /> \end \define selectDayActions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-Source"/> \end", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605221947961" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/macros/global": { "created": "20200521075713107", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\define entryLinkBack(day,time) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-navigate $to="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/capture" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" text=$day$/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/DN-Source" text="$time$" /> $day$ @ $time$ \end \define dn-ts(timestamp) <$parsedate name=td timestamp=$timestamp$ format="[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD"> <$set name=entryTime value={{{ [titlegetindex<__timestamp__>] }}} }> <> \end \define get-tmTiddler() $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-timeTiddler/$(td)$ ", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/macros/global", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605210946822" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/variables": { "created": "20200521201106129", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\define get-origEntry() $(lf)$$(entryTime)$~$(entryAction)$$(entryData)$
\define get-edittedEntry() $(lf)$$(trimmedEdittedEntry)$
\define get-TodoIndex() $(today)$~$(entryTime)$$(entryData)$ \define get-TodoAdd() /todo $(add)$ \define get-timeTiddler() $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-timeTiddler/$(todayUTC)$ \define get-dateformat() $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/dateformat \define UTCdateformat() [UTC]$(dateformat)$", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/variables", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605221605374" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewEntries": { "created": "20200521201322054", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\define displayNewFormat() \end

Entries of the: <$select tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" default="" actions=<> > <$list filter='[all[]tag[DailyNotes]!sort[title]]' variable="DNTiddler"> <$list filter="[split[-]nth[2]]" emptyMessage=<> >

<$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$set name=Content tiddler={{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection}} emptyValue="" > <$list filter="[split[
]!is[blank]]" variable="entry"> <$vars entryTime={{{ [split[~]first[]trim[]] }}} entryData={{{ [split[~]butfirst[]trim[]] }}} > <$list filter="[regexp[/todo(?i)]]" variable=result emptyMessage=<> > <$vars entryData = {{{ [split[/todo]trim[]join[]trim[]] }}} entryAction="/todo ">
<>
", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewEntries", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605221844993", "caption": "Previous Entries" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/widgets/parsedate.js": { "text": "/*\ title: $:/core/modules/widgets/set.js type: application/javascript module-type: widget Set variable widget \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; var Widget = require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget; var parseDateWidget = function(parseTreeNode,options) { this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options); }; /* Inherit from the base widget class */ parseDateWidget.prototype = new Widget(); /* Render this widget into the DOM */ parseDateWidget.prototype.render = function(parent,nextSibling) { this.parentDomNode = parent; this.computeAttributes(); this.execute(); this.renderChildren(parent,nextSibling); }; /* Compute the internal state of the widget */ parseDateWidget.prototype.execute = function() { // Get our parameters this.setName = this.getAttribute("name","currentTiddler"); //this.setValue = this.getAttribute("value"); this.timestamp = this.getAttribute("timestamp"); this.format = this.getAttribute("format",""); this.setValue = this.getValueAsDate(this.format); // Set context variable this.setVariable(this.setName,this.getValue(),this.parseTreeNode.params,!!this.parseTreeNode.isMacroDefinition); // Construct the child widgets this.makeChildWidgets(); }; /* Get the value to be assigned */ parseDateWidget.prototype.getValue = function() { var value = this.setValue; return value || ""; }; parseDateWidget.prototype.getValueAsDate = function(format) { format = format || "YYYY MM DD 0hh:0mm"; var value = $tw.utils.parseDate(this.timestamp); if(value && $tw.utils.isDate(value) && value.toString() !== "Invalid Date") { return $tw.utils.formatDateString(value,format); } else { return ""; } }; /* Selectively refreshes the widget if needed. Returns true if the widget or any of its children needed re-rendering */ parseDateWidget.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) { var changedAttributes = this.computeAttributes(); if(changedAttributes.name || changedAttributes.value || (this.setFilter && this.getValue() != this.variables[this.setName].value)) { this.refreshSelf(); return true; } else { return this.refreshChildren(changedTiddlers); } }; exports.parsedate = parseDateWidget; })();", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "application/javascript", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/widgets/parsedate.js", "tags": "", "module-type": "widget", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200526211025578", "creator": "akhater", "created": "20200520182721145" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/captureEntries": { "created": "20200521202857852", "creator": "akhater", "text": "

<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template=<> /> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Manually edit Today's notes">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> />

<$keyboard key="enter"> <$edit-text class="dn-input input-large" tiddler="$:/temp/Append" field="newEntry" placeholder="Free your mind, dump it here..." focus="true"/> <$vars timestamp=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=<> /> <$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$set name="add" value={{{ [{$:/temp/Append!!newEntry}trim[]] }}} > <$list filter="[regexp[/todo(?i)]]" variable=result emptyMessage=<> > <$vars add = {{{ [split[/todo]trim[]join[ ]trim[]] }}}> <$vars add=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$fieldmangler tiddler=<> > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="DailyNotes" /> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/Append" newEntry /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/DN-Selection" text=<> /> <> ", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/captureEntries", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200605221524841" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions/todo": { "created": "20200602070108790", "creator": "akhater", "text": "\define TiddlerTasksStatus() $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/Tasks/Status/$(entrymnth)$ \define TiddlerinboxTasksList() $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/Tasks/Lists/inbox \define DN-todo-add() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="pending" $subfilter=<> /> \end \define DN-todo-checkbox(isTodoTab:"false") <$list filter="""[<__isTodoTab__>match[true]]"""> <$set name=entryts value=<> > <$wikify name="entrymnth" text="""<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template=YYYY0MM />"""> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="done" unchecked="pending" default="pending" checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<> > <$list filter="""[<__isTodoTab__>match[false]]""" variable=entryts> <$set name=entryts filter="[split[dn-ts ]butfirst[]] +[removesuffix[>>'']]" > <$wikify name="entrymnth" text="""<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template=YYYY0MM />"""> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="done" unchecked="pending" default="pending" checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<> > \end \define DN-todo-done() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="pending" $subfilter=-$(entryts)$ /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="done" $subfilter=$(entryts)$ /> \end \define DN-todo-undone() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="pending" $subfilter=$(entryts)$ /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="done" $subfilter=-$(entryts)$ /> \end \define get-todoEntry() <$wikify name="entryTiddler" text="""<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template=YYYY0MM0DD />"""> <$set name=Content tiddler=<> emptyValue="" > <$list filter="[split[
]!is[blank]]" variable="entry"> <$vars entryTime={{{ [split[~]first[]trim[]] }}} entryData={{{ [split[~]butfirst[]trim[]] }}} > <$set name=entryts filter="[split[dn-ts ]butfirst[]] +[removesuffix[>>'']]"> <$list filter="[match]"> <$vars entryData = {{{ [split[/todo]trim[]join[]trim[]] }}} > <> \end ", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/functions/todo", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200603105940217" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewTasks": { "created": "20200603041923083", "creator": "akhater", "text": "<$list filter="[enlist{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/Tasks/Lists/inbox!!pending}]" variable=todots> <> <>
", "bag": "default", "revision": "0", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewTasks", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200603111359035", "caption": "Pending Tasks" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/tabs": { "text": "<$vars hasTasks={{{ [enlist{$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/Tasks/Lists/inbox!!pending}] +[then[$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewTasks]else[]] }}} > <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[enlist[$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewEntries]][enlist]" default="$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/viewEntries" /> ", "bag": "default", "revision": "1", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/ui/tabs", "tags": "", "modifier": "akhater", "modified": "20200604094220657", "creator": "akhater", "created": "20200603110138825" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171443220", "text": "Calls the Daily Notes Tiddler", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171522039" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171534672", "text": "alt+q", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171556646" } } }
